name: Clash of Legends: Heroes
description:
Like Artillery shooter game?
Enjoy Fantasy adventures?
Download now!

Transform into mythical heroes in the stories. Challenge your artillery shooting skills in different maps, face off against unrivaled enemies and players, and become the legends!

GAME FEATURES

EASY TO PLAY
• Simple drag and drop control.

LOT OF CONTENTS
• Over 100+ campaigns to explore.
• More than 15 different characters and guardians with unique skills.
• A lot of items to use in the battles: Double Blast, Potions, Teleportation,...

PVP ONLINE
• Turn-based online multiplayer.
• Custom rooms to play with friends.
• Competitive Ranked League.
• Global leaderboard

COLLECTING AND CRAFTING
• Collect fragments to upgrade your characters.

Join us now!

CONTACT US
• Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflegendsheroes/
• Email: support@vgamestd.com
• Public Discord: https://discord.gg/bxYFWCG
